com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera

Class SimpleCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera.Camera
      • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera.SimpleCamera

  • public class SimpleCamera
extends Camera
    The default camera used by MapboxNavigation.
    Since:
    0.10.0

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double bearing(RouteInformation routeInformation)
      Direction that the camera is pointing in, in degrees clockwise from north.
      com.mapbox.geojson.Point target(RouteInformation routeInformation)
      The location that the camera is pointing at.
      double tilt(RouteInformation routeInformation)
      The angle, in degrees, of the camera angle from the nadir (directly facing the Earth).
      double zoom(RouteInformation routeInformation)
      Zoom level near the center of the screen.
